import java.util.*;
class test{
    public static void main(String ar[])
    {
        Scanner sc= new Scanner(System.in);
        int t=sc.nextInt();
        for(int i=1;i<=t;i++)
        {
            int n=sc.nextInt();
            int a[]=new int[n];
            for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
                a[j]=sc.nextInt();
            Arrays.sort(a);
            System.out.println("Case "+i+": "+(a[n-1]+a[n-2]+a[n-3]));
        }
    }
}
